text:
Hi 
while rendering a table having around 5000 rows I am getting
out of memory exception.
Is there any workaround for this problem other than increasing the heap size of 
the jvm.

thanks,
Vijay
creator: vvhegde@rediffmail.com
jeremias@apache.org
text:
Please don't use Bugzilla for asking questions. Buzilla is for bugs, requests 
for enhancement and patches. Questions should be posted on the fop-user 
mailing list. Please post any follow-ups there. Please also check out: 
http://xml.apache.org/fop/gethelp.html

Please see the FAQ for common solutions to your problem:
http://xml.apache.org/fop/faq.html#OutOfMemoryException

Another good source of information are the mailing list archives.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
